title: [Large-scale] Teacher Competency Enhancement Program for Monitoring Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of cooperative learning principles and basic teaching experience
context.additional_context: Participants focus on observing and analyzing student interactions in a language-subject-centered collaborative learning environment. The program combines video-based training and case studies using personal devices in a blended format

learning_goals: Learners can identify collaborative, cognitive, and metacognitive activity indicators of students with 80% accuracy by analyzing real cooperative learning video cases
Monitoring competency improves by over 30% in pre-post assessments after video-based training.
It can diagnose student interaction issues during collaborative learning across three dimensions (collaboration, cognition, and metacognition) and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
